title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the distributed AI inference framework, including components, communication protocols, deployment strategies, and discuss potential trade-offs between latency, resource utilization, and network efficiency.

title: Develop Edge Device Components
description: Implement the components responsible for running AI models on edge devices, including model optimization, resource management, and communication with the central server.

title: Develop Cloud Server Components
description: Implement the components responsible for managing AI models, distributing workloads, and aggregating results from edge devices.

title: Implement Communication Protocols
description: Design and implement secure and efficient communication protocols for data exchange between edge devices and cloud servers.

title: Develop Resource Management Strategies
description: Implement strategies for optimizing resource utilization across edge devices and cloud servers, considering factors like model size, computational requirements, and network conditions.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for managing AI models, monitoring system performance, and configuring deployment settings.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the security of the distributed AI inference framework by implementing authentication, encryption, and access control mechanisms.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the distributed AI inference framework.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to ensure the correctness and reliability of the distributed AI inference framework, including unit tests, integration tests, and performance tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare user guides, developer documentation, and other relevant materials to support the adoption and maintenance of the distributed AI inference framework.
